trans-unit.source: Specifying DNS Settings in a service configuration file | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Specifying DNS Settings in a service configuration file | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: specifying custom DNS settings using service configuration file for virtual network
trans-unit.target: specifying custom DNS settings using service configuration file for virtual network

trans-unit.source: Specifying DNS Settings in a Service Configuration File
trans-unit.target: Specifying DNS Settings in a Service Configuration File

trans-unit.source: A service configuration file may contain a DnsServers element with a list of IPv4 addresses for the Domain Name System (DNS) servers that the service will use.
trans-unit.target: A service configuration file may contain a DnsServers element with a list of IPv4 addresses for the Domain Name System (DNS) servers that the service will use.

trans-unit.source: Settings in the service configuration file take precedence over settings in the network configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Settings in the service configuration file take precedence over settings in the network configuration file.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Azure Service Configuration Schema (.cscfg File)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/ee758710.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Azure Service Configuration Schema (.cscfg File)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/ee758710.aspx).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.WARNING] The **name** attribute in the **DnsServer** element is used only as a reference name.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.WARNING] The **name** attribute in the **DnsServer** element is used only as a reference name.

trans-unit.source: It does not represent the host name for the DNS server.
trans-unit.target: It does not represent the host name for the DNS server.

trans-unit.source: Each **DnsServer** attribute value must be unique across the entire Microsoft Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: Each **DnsServer** attribute value must be unique across the entire Microsoft Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: Configure a Virtual Network Using Network Configuration Files
trans-unit.target: Configure a Virtual Network Using Network Configuration Files

trans-unit.source: About Virtual Network settings in the Management Portal
trans-unit.target: About Virtual Network settings in the Management Portal
